title: Worked Solution
text:
To solve this equation, you need to isolate the a term. You can start by subtracting $$5$$ from both sides of the equation to obtain:
$$5(a-3)=-10-5$$
Then, you can simplify the left-hand side of the equation by using the distributive property:
$$5a-15=-10-5$$
